reviewText: GET THIS DVD IF YOU WANT THE ORIGINAL SHOW THAT AIRED ON TV! I LOVE THIS AND MY KIDS LOVE IT,THEY WATCH IT OVER AND OVER AND THEN SING ALL DAY ABOUT THE LAND OF HONALEE! BUY IT!

This is a wonderful children's cartoon.  A must see.  A favorite from when I was a child.  I watched the movie today after not seeing it for 25+ years and it was still as good as I remember it.  The item came in a timely fashion and in good condition.
